Class ConcurrentSoftReferenceStore

Class Attributes:
  • output : false
    •  
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    cachebox.build-coldbox.coldbox.system.cache.store.IObjectStore

    I am a concurrent soft reference object store. In other words, I am fancy!
